alert.note: Alert for Eastern Chichagof Island (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 14 at 6:34AM AKST until January 15 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...LONG DURATION SNOW EVENT FOR THIS WEEKEND... .Snow will continue to fall over the northern panhandle throughout the day today. Snow has begun transitioning to be wetter and more dense with snow ratios falling to 20 to one in the northern inner channels and will likely continue to moisten throughout the day. Snowfall rates are expected to gradually increase in intensity through the afternoon and into tonight. ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKST MONDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 4 to 7 inches. * WHERE...Eastern Chichagof Island. * WHEN...Until 6 AM AKST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will become wetter and heavier throughout the day Sunday. Rain may start mixing with snow early Monday morning.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water with you in case of an emergency. People are urged to prepare their property before the onset of winter weather. For the latest road conditions, where available, call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
